BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Squadron, S.2977, and Assembly Member Silver, A.4578, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing an intercity bus passenger service permit system in cities having a population of one million or more”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishing an intercity bus passenger service permit system in cities having a population of one million or more. (S.2977/ A.4578)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Squadron, S.2977, and Assembly Member Silver, A.4578, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing an intercity bus passenger service permit system in cities having a population of one million or more”.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Establishing an intercity bus passenger service permit system in cities having a population of one million or more. (S.2977/ A.4578)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  Vacca and Chin
